recommendations.title: What Will It Cost India, Other Countries If Internet Goes Down for 1 Hour or 1 Day?

recommendations.title: Don’t Set Your Goals in Stone — Mold Them Like Clay
recommendations.excerpt: A popular analogy compares our goals to rocks in a jar: put the big rocks (your most valued goals) in the jar first, or else the smaller (less important) rocks will take up all the space. But goals aren’t rocks; in fact, they’re more like balls of soft clay that require molding as much as prioritizing.
